name: Pantosec-D Tablet
description: Pantosec-D Tablet is a prescription medicine used to treat gastroesophageal reflux disease (Acid reflux) and peptic ulcer disease by relieving the symptoms of acidity such as indigestion, heartburn, stomach pain, or irritation.
common_side_effect: Diarrhea, Stomach pain, Flatulence, Dryness in mouth, Dizziness, Headache
